Text.Name: FightDifficultCoefficient
Text.Desc: Difficulty of Cultivators, Monsters, Ancient Beasts, Ancient Cultivators and Sects.
Text.Values.0.Name: Very Low
Text.Values.1.Name: Weak
Text.Values.2.Name: Ordinary
Text.Values.3.Name: Strong
Text.Values.4.Name: Very High

Text.Name: LiveDifficulty
Text.Desc: The speed at which plants grow and crop production multiplier.
Text.Values.0.Name: Very Low
Text.Values.1.Name: Low
Text.Values.2.Name: Ordinary

Text.Name: BaseMood
Text.Desc: The base mood value for characters during their default status.
Text.Values.0.Name: Very High
Text.Values.1.Name: High
Text.Values.2.Name: Ordinary

Text.Name: WorkAddp
Text.Desc: The speed at which characters perform most work.
Text.Values.0.Name: Very Quick
Text.Values.1.Name: Agile
Text.Values.2.Name: Ordinary

Text.Name: PracticeAddp
Text.Desc: The speed at which characters cultivate.
Text.Values.0.Name: Very Quick
Text.Values.1.Name: Agile
Text.Values.2.Name: Ordinary

Text.Name: MapExploringAddp
Text.Desc: The speed at which characters complete adventures.
Text.Values.0.Name: Very Quick
Text.Values.1.Name: Agile
Text.Values.2.Name: Ordinary

Text.Name: TreeExpAddtion
Text.Desc: Inspiration required for characters to learn manuals.
Text.Values.0.Name: Very Low
Text.Values.1.Name: Low
Text.Values.2.Name: Ordinary

Text.Name: AverageTimePerEvent
Text.Values.0.Name: Very Long
Text.Values.0.Desc: On average, one event will occur every 3 days.
Text.Values.1.Name: Long
Text.Values.1.Desc: On average, one event will occur every 2,5 days.
Text.Values.2.Name: Ordinary
Text.Values.2.Desc: On average, one event will occur every 2 days.
Text.Values.3.Name: Short
Text.Values.3.Desc: On average, one event will occur every 1,5 days.
Text.Values.4.Name: Very Short
Text.Values.4.Desc: On average, one event will occur every day.

Text.Name: DoubleRate
Text.Desc: Whenever an event occurs, there is a chance another event will trigger.
Text.Values.0.Name: None
Text.Values.1.Name: Low
Text.Values.2.Name: Medium
Text.Values.3.Name: High
Text.Values.4.Name: Very High

Text.Name: TripleRate
Text.Desc: Whenever an event occurs, there is a chance two additional events will trigger.
Text.Values.0.Name: None
Text.Values.1.Name: Low
Text.Values.2.Name: Medium
Text.Values.3.Name: High
Text.Values.4.Name: Very High

Text.Name: BlankWeight
Text.Desc: When an event occurs, there is a chance that this event will not trigger.
Text.Values.0.Name: Very High
Text.Values.1.Name: High
Text.Values.2.Name: Medium
Text.Values.3.Name: Low
Text.Values.4.Name: None
